decks.notes: The deck is focused on aggressive tactics and quickly overwhelming opponents with a mix of creatures and burn spells. Ghyrson Starn, Kelermorph leads the charge, supported by a variety of low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Sprite Dragon. Burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning help clear the way for attacks, while counterspells like Force of Will provide protection. The deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain it throughout the game, using efficient threats and disruptive spells to control the board. By leveraging the commander's abilities and a mix of aggressive creatures and spells, the deck aims to win the game quickly before opponents can stabilize.
